testcase.name: jsonSchemaValidation

failure.message:
1 expectation failed. Response body doesn't match expectation. Expected: The content to match the given JSON schema. error: instance type (string) does not match any allowed primitive type (allowed: ["integer"]) level: "error" schema: {"loadingURI":"file:/C:/Users/prasa/eclipse-workspace/restAssured/target/test-classes/store.json#","pointer":"/items/0/properties/username"} instance: {"pointer":"/0/username"} domain: "validation" keyword: "type" found: "string" expected: ["integer"]
Actual: [ { "id": "1", "username": "rahul_admin", "fullName": "Rahul Sharma", "email": "rahul@gmail.com", "phone": "9876543210", "role": "ADMIN", "gender": "male", "dob": "1990-05-12", "address": { "street": "MG Road", "city": "Bangalore", "state": "Karnataka", "pincode": "560001" }, "isActive": true, "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z", "lastLogin": "2024-12-10T08:45:00Z" }, { "id": "2", "username": "amit_user", "fullName": "Amit Verma", "email": "amit@gmail.com", "phone": "9123456789", "role": "USER", "gender": "male", "dob": "1995-09-20", "address": { "street": "Sector 22", "city": "Gurgaon", "state": "Haryana", "pincode": "122016" }, "isActive": true, "createdAt": "2024-02-01T11:00:00Z", "lastLogin": null } ]
